body_html: @girving I'd call it "band-aid fixed". Fully fixed would mean I could do whatever I wanted with opencv and not have it affect TensorFlow, I think. I have no idea why this happens or what the situation is, so maybe it's actually opencv's fault, or nvidia's fault or something.
